phrs.translation: 少数的人；少量的几个人

sentences.sentence: He was lifting up handfuls of leaves and throwing them at her. She was laughing and egging him on.
sentences.translation: 他正抓起把把树叶朝她扔去。她笑着，怂恿他继续扔。

sentences.sentence: I could take handfuls of darkness!
Mickey and Frank gathered small bills and handfuls of change.
sentences.translation: 米奇和弗兰克筹集了几块钱和一把硬币。
